segments.text: Were you in a leadership position when you were a college student ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was president of the Student Council of our university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you get any honors or awards at your university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was elected Excellent Party Member for four academic years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were you involved in any club activities at your university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was a member of the Student Poetry Society . I like writing poems in my spare time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What extracurricular activities did you usually take part in at your college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sometimes played table tennis and sometimes played basketball .
segments.speaker: S2
